plugins.photosPermission: InCloset needs access to your photos to let you select clothes images.
plugins.cameraPermission: InCloset needs access to your camera to take photos of your clothes.

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: InCloset needs access to your camera to take photos of your clothes
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: InCloset needs access to your photo library to select photos of your clothes
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: InCloset needs access to your photo library to save photos of your clothes
